summary: Test suite that verifies the AudioLDM2 diffusion‑based audio generation pipeline, covering fast unit checks for core behavior, edge‑case handling, component integration, input preparation, sampling methods, prompt and embedding handling, output format, batch processing, model saving/loading, device offloading, data type conversion, and optional acceleration kernels, as well as slower integration scenarios for standard, large, language‑model‑guided, and text‑to‑speech configurations.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability, performance, and correctness of the audio generation service before deployment, supporting diverse use cases such as large‑scale generation, language‑model conditioning, and text‑to‑speech, thereby reducing defects and enhancing user experience.
